title.rendered: Jayco Roper: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Jayco Roper
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
    • Horses
  • Jayco Roper’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Girlfriend
    • How old is he?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • Career Highlights
    • FAQs About Jayco Roper

Jayco Roper is a professional rodeo contestant known for his success in bareback riding. He has competed in various rodeos and has achieved significant milestones in his career. In 2022, he won the Okeechobee (Fla.) Cowtown Rodeo and the Southern Indiana Rodeo.

Here you can follow Jayco Roper’s net worth, career earnings, career overview, relationship status, and more.

About Jayco Roper

Jayco Roper was born in 2001 and hails from Oktaha, Oklahoma. He comes from a family with a strong rodeo background, including his grandmother Betty Roper, who is a six-time world-champion barrel racer.

Jayco attended Oktaha Oklahoma High School and has been competing in rodeos professionally for over 14 years.

Early Career

Roper’s early career began with success in the Oklahoma Junior High Rodeo Association, where he won a national title as a seventh-grader in 2015.

He transitioned to bareback horses around the age of 14 and quickly began competing with more experienced riders.

Professional Career

In his professional career, Roper has achieved significant success. In 2020, he broke a 13-year-old record at the Sandhills Stock Show & Rodeo in Odessa, Texas, making an 88-point ride.

He finished second in the 2020 PRCA | Resistol Rookie Standings with $13,734. In 2023, he had a successful season, finishing ninth in the world standings and qualifying for his first National Finals Rodeo.

Roper has won several rodeos, including the Ram Prairie Circuit Finals, the Big V Feeds Pro Rodeo, the Rodeo Minot, and the Wayne Herman. He also led the way in bareback riding at the RAM Prairie Circuit Finals, marking a great start to the 2024 season.

At the 2023 Reno Rodeo, Roper was one of the two bareback champions. He also bested a loaded bareback riding field at the Cheyenne Frontier Days rodeo.

As of September 2023, Roper was ranked 8th in the PRCA Bareback World Standings with earnings of $127,968.

Horses

At the 2023 Cheyenne Frontier Days rodeo, he rode a horse named Red Velvet from King Wentz Rodeo, scoring 84.5 points.

At the Gooding Pro Rodeo, he split the win with an 87-point ride on a horse named Red Beard from Summit Pro Rodeo.

Jayco Roper’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Jayco Roper’s net worth is estimated to be $1 million.

As of September 2023, Roper had earned $127,968 in the PRCA Bareback World Standings.

Career Earnings

Throughout his career, Roper has earned significant prize money from various rodeo events. Some notable earnings include $7,375 from the 2023 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo and $18,180 from the Lake County Round-up and Washington State Fair Pro Rodeo.

Personal Details

Girlfriend

Roper appears to be single. The bareback rider prefers to keep his private life away from the spotlight. He is focused on his career.

How old is he?

As of 2023, he is 22 years old.

How tall is he?

He is 5 ft 9 inches tall.

What is his nationality?

He is American.

Career Highlights

  • Career earnings: $102,638
  • 2022 world standings place: 19th (BB)
  • 2022 earnings: $65,763

FAQs About Jayco Roper

What is Jayco Roper’s Net Worth?

Estimated $1 million as of 2023.

How old is he?

He is 22 years old.

Who is his grandmother?

Betty Roper, a six-time world champion barrel racer.
